original_text: You did not say “Hello” to me with a kiss. But this woman began to kiss my feet when she came in. And she has not stopped.
korean_text: 너는 내게 입맞추지 아니하였으되 그는 내가 들어올 때로부터 내 발에 입맞추기를 그치지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: You did not say "Hello" to me with a kiss.
But this woman began to kiss my feet
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이 여자는 내 발에 입맞춤을 시작했습니다.
